CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1957, page A13, reads: "Roy Gets the 'Pitch' - Pittsburgh's own Roy Eldridge gets the 'pitch' - and not for his famous trumpet this time - but on how Pittsburgh women are getting the new ' slim look' these days at Slender. Belle's Slenderizing Salon. Roy took time out after his recent appearance in the 'Jazz at the Philharmonic' concert to visit his friends on the salon's staff. From all appearances he was easily and quickly sold on the method by the personnel shown here, including, left to right: Beverly Pope, technician: Gladys Miller, assistant manager; Genevieve Still, technician, and Lola Berg, manager. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lola Berg, Gladys Miller, Beverly Pope, Roy Eldridge, and Genevieve Still looking at open book in interior with light colored wall and florescent lighting
